titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the total amount paid by a self-employed taxpayer for his or her health insurance premiums will be allowed as a business deduction.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/1/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the total amount paid by a self-employed taxpayer for his or her health insurance premiums will be allowed as a business deduction.
